bililive.speaker: Live Danmaku
bililive.settings.room.name: Bilibili Live Room ID
bililive.settings.room.hint: Bilibili Live Room to sync danmaku.
bililive.settings.giftPublic.name: Public Gift Message
bililive.settings.giftPublic.hint: If checked, all players will be able to see the gift messages.
bililive.settings.danmakuPublic.name: Public Danmaku Message
bililive.settings.danmakuPublic.hint: If checked, all players will be able to see the danmaku messages.
bililive.settings.commandPublic.name: Public Query Message
bililive.settings.commandPublic.hint: If checked, all players will be able to see the query results.
bililive.settings.profanityFilter.name: Danmaku Profanity Filter
bililive.settings.profanityFilter.hint: （Split by Space）If a danmaku content contains any one of these words, it would be ignored.
bililive.settings.senderFilter.name: Sender Filter
bililive.settings.senderFilter.hint: （Split by Space）If the sender of a danmaku is listed below, their operation would be ignored.
